news_items.title: Local control of £20 million transport funding gets the green flag
news_items.description: Hull and East Yorkshire Combined Authority plan to take control of funding and powers to make decisions from Whitehall is up and running - after a series of Board decisions at a key meeting on Wednesday 28 May.

news_items.title: The Right to Grow scheme is now open for applications
news_items.description: The Right to Grow scheme gives communities the ability to plant and grow on Council-owned land. Applications are now open.

news_items.title: Let's Go Electric!
news_items.description: Hull City Council and East Riding of Yorkshire Council are teaming up with Let's Experience Electric to host the area’s first electric vehicle event at the Priory Park and Ride site, on Saturday 21 June 2025, from 10am to 3pm.

news_items.title: High ropes course open for bookings
news_items.description: Hull Adventure Centre’s exhilarating new high ropes course is open to be public.
